main event: A bright greenish-blue object, similar in size to a basketball, was observed near Beckley, West Virginia on June 6, 1960, and reportedly disappeared suddenly.
interesting points: The object was described as hovering and brighter than the crescent moon., The sighting lasted approximately 3-5 seconds., Two additional witnesses corroborated the sighting with similar descriptions., The object appeared to move at varying speeds before disappearing., The object was initially thought to be a meteor but could not be conclusively identified.
sighted object: a greenish-blue object resembling a basketball
witness description: two additional witnesses reported a similar observation
